name: 6,7,4'-trihydroxyflavanone, [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating, aryl migration)
definition: 6,7,4'-Trihydroxyflavanone + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> 2,6,7,4'-Tetrahydroxyisoflavanone + H2O + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
